sentences.english: Dai Zhen was a unique scholar during the Qian- Jia time, who was expert at textual research and argumentation.
sentences.chinese: 戴震兼擅義理與考據，在乾嘉學術史上獨樹一幟。

sentences.english: The mother is not good at words, always well towards our smile.
sentences.chinese: 船孃不擅言辭，總是呵呵地朝着我們笑。

sentences.english: They generally live near water and are excellent swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 它們通常生活在水域附近，猶擅游泳。

sentences.english: Infiuenced by the style of drama, Liyu has set a fixed valuation of his which are generally considered to be "voiclsess plays".
sentences.chinese: 李漁是一個兼擅戲曲和小說創作的作家。

sentences.english: He is good at giving an entertaining speech completely off the cuff.
sentences.chinese: 他擅長髮表即度的娛樂演說。

sentences.english: The unsociable person is hardly fit for a diplomat.
sentences.chinese: 不擅社交的人幾乎不適合做外交家。

sentences.english: Of all the tigers, the wood tiger is the team player.
sentences.chinese: 在所有虎中，木虎最擅團隊合作。

sentences.english: Trespassing heart Road, will Tak high end goods.
sentences.chinese: 擅心道者，必定德高且品端。
